name: Bombarded
description:
Game Instructions:

1. Use WASD or the arrow keys to move around.

2. Your task is to diffuse as many bombs that land in your territory as you can, before they explode and kill your tiles. To do so, you can either (a) catch them as they land or (b) if they've already landed on a tile, rush over to that tile quick!

3. Keep as many tiles alive as possible! Failure to keep at least around a third of the game board alive will result in a game over.

4. To pause, press the Tab key.

Hope you enjoy :)

- RyGuyGamez
